frame.name: Touring
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Tourist</fen> experiences an <fen>Attraction</fen>, a location with a unique history or other societally recognized individual character, with the goal of seeing and learning about it. Typically, the <fen>Attraction</fen> has a source of information about the <fen>Attraction</fen>--a guide, pamphlets, or displays.
<ex><fex name="Tourist">We</fex> <t>toured</t> <fex name="Attraction">the Grand Canyon</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Tourist
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual that is seeking an experience at an Attraction.</def-root>

FE.name: Attraction
FE.definition: <def-root>The societally-recognized unique location that the <fen>Tourist</fen> experiences.</def-root>

FE.name: Depictive
FE.definition: <def-root>The state of the <fen>Tourist</fen> or the <fen>Attraction</fen> during the tour.</def-root>

FE.name: Ground
FE.definition: <def-root>The perceptual background against which the <fen>Attraction</fen> is experienced by the <fen>Tourist</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the details of the event in terms of how they compare to other events (<ment>the same way</ment>) or in terms of how the state of the <fen>Tourist</fen> affects them (<ment>happily, obliviously</ment>).</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Means</fen> indicates a method the <fen>Tourist</fen> is using to participate in a tour.
</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time that the touring takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>Some action that the <fen>Tourist</fen> is trying to accomplish with touring. This is generally (at a minimum) for the purposes of entertainment and learning. </def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the touring takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The amount of time the touring activity lasts.</def-root>

FE.name: Particular_iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states. </def-root>

FE.name: Co-participant
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Co-participant</fen> is an entity that participates in a coordinated way in the touring event with the <fen>Tourist</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: toerist.n
lexUnit.definition: die naar mooie, leuke en/of interessante plekken reist

lexUnit.name: toerisme.n
lexUnit.definition: als ontspanning, in het bijzonder naar interessante of mooie gebieden
